data.text: @deadmclngn Thanks for your Tweet Dea. The social media team is only able to respond to messages in English. Are you able to repost in English so we can assist? –M

@venturescott Thanks for your Tweet Scott. As of this writing, we have some flight out of Bali affected by volcanic activity. Could you please DM (direct message) your booking reference and full name so I can take a look further on this? –M

@aqsathya19 Hi there, thanks for the tweet. I can see that you need assistance with updating your name on the booking. Kindly DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can assist. Regards - Joie

@renanda1809 Thanks for your tweet Renanda. It may help to know that an oversized item handling fee applies to any item with a single side longer than one metre (1000mm, 39in),including wheels, handles and packaging. To know more about this, please see here: https://t.co/yO2N3Ng4E2. Regards-F

@HlnaBaes Hi there, thanks for your tweet. I'm concerned to hear about the details of your cancelled flight and I'm sorry for the inconvenience that it caused you. Can you DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can assist you further? Regards - Franz

@GMusari Thanks for the tweet Musari. I can see that you need assistance with your booking. Please know that we don't advise passengers to post personal details publicly. Kindly DM us your booking reference and full name so we can further assist. You may wish to delete this tweet. - J
@niponghan Hi Pong. We'd like to look into this. Kindly DM us your booking reference number along with your full name and the changes that you'd like to make with your booking. Thanks - H
@Niceshe1 Hi Nie. Thanks for your Tweet. The social media team are only able to respond to messages in English. Are you able to retweet in English so we can assist? - H

@KazuTsuruda Hi Kazu. Thanks for your Tweet. I'm glad that you were assisted by one of our crew on board your flight to Taipei. I appreciate that you took time to provide us your traveling experience. I'll make sure to pass on your feedback to Flora. I know she will really appreciate it. - H
@narwulandari 2/2 You can find full details here: https://t.co/nbSwS0YDmU. Regards - Yen

@narwulandari 1/2 Hi Nuzulul, thanks for the tweet. We receive so many requests like this, all of which are for very worthwhile causes. Unfortunately we can’t support them all, so we’d recommend you taking a look at our Flying Start program and applying for a grant.

@bradley_charles Hi there, thanks for the tweet. I can see that you are enquiring about the status of your flight to Melbourne. Kindly direct message us your booking reference along with your full name so we can check this for you. Regards - Joie

domain.name: Place
domain.description: Named places in the world, like Fenway Park

data.text: @yelofarent11 Hi Yeffry, thanks for your reply. Do you have the 6 alpha numeric booking reference. Alternatively, kindly provide us your flight details via DM. Please also provide the copy of their passport. Regards - Yen

@yelofarent11 Hi Yeffry, 

Thanks for sending us a message. 

Are you able to provide us your booking reference and your full name so I could look into this for you?

Regards - Yen

@yelofarent11 Hi Yeffry. I would like to assist you with updating the name on the booking. Could you DM us your booking reference number, your full name and the details of the correction you'd like to make.  Thanks - H
@RachelXue4 Hi Rachel. I'd like to assist you in updating the gender of the passengers in the booking. Please DM us your booking along with full name. Thanks - H
@BrunaSFontes Hi Bruna. Sorry to hear about this. If you could DM us your booking reference number along with your full name please so we can check this for you. Thanks - H

@richardmartinj Hi Richard, thanks for the tweet and I'm sorry to hear about your luggage. Please know that we don't advise passengers to post personal details including your case number publicly. Kindly DM us further information so we can further assist. You may wish to delete this tweet. – J

@adk_1985 2/2 Thanks for letting us know, I’ll forward this to the relevant team so they can look into resolving this issue. The only way to apply for price beat is through our website, what I can suggest is checking our website from time to time to see if it's working already. - Joie

@adk_1985 1/2 Hi TK, thanks for the tweet. I understand that you're having trouble applying for our Price beat guarantee due to the button not working. I have checked this for you and I apologise that the ‘Apply now’ is not appearing.
@DannyMatocinos Hi Dan, thanks for the tweet and I'm sorry to hear about your damaged baggage. Kindly DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can further assist. Regards - Joie

@alibaylar Hi Ali. Thanks for your Tweet. I understand you're unhappy about our baggage fee and we'd like to look into this for you. Please DM us your booking reference number and your full name. Thanks - H
@FatiElo Hi there. I've responded to your DM. Please check your inbox. Thanks - H

@wulidhaf Hi Wulidha, I can see that you are enquiring the price for 20 kg checked baggage allowance to Singapore. Kindly DM us your booking reference and full name so we can further look into this for you. Regards - Joie
@dhennok Hi Denok, thanks for the tweet. Kindly send us a DM along with your booking reference and full name, we'll be very happy to look into this for you. Regards - Yen

@RozzleP Hi Rozi. I can appreciate how upsetting it is that your flight to Hanoi was delayed and I'm sorry to hear if this means that you will miss your connection. so we could check this for you, kindly DM us your booking reference number and your full name. Thanks - H

data.text: @horan71 Hi Daniel, thanks for your tweet. Could you please DM (direct message) us more details of your concern along with your booking reference and full name so I can check this further? Thanks – Franz
@arxncxgabrixl Hi there. We'd like to look into this for you. Please DM us your booking reference number along with your full name. Thanks - H

@geoffrey_croes Hi Geoffrey, thanks for the tweet. We aim to release our flight schedules approximately 9 months in advanced. Flights for February 2020 should be available around early June 2019. Hope this helps. :) Regards - Yen
@GMusari Hi Musari. I'll be happy to assist you with your request. Please DM us your booking reference number along with your full name and a copy of your valid ID. Thanks - H

@marla_cg Hi Marla. Thanks for the shout out and for taking the time to tell us about your experience. We really want to pass this awesome feedback on to our team, can you please send us a DM with your booking reference and some more details. Thanks! - H
@marla_cg Hi Marla, thanks for the tag. The social media team are only able to respond to messages in English. Are you able to repost in English so we can assist? Regards -  Yen
@ryanhadefi Hi Ryan, thanks for the tweet. I understand that your flight was rescheduled. So I could look into this for you, kindly DM us your booking reference and full name. Regards - Yen

@EdwinSutami Hi Edwin, sorry to hear about your lost baggage. We'd like to check this further for you. If you could please send us a DM along with your booking reference and full name, we'll be very happy to assist. Regards - Yen

@joanmartinez Hi Joan, we do allow water bottle on board however, if you will be travelling internationally our staff or the airport security may ask you to dispose this due to restrictions  on liquids. You can check here for details: https://t.co/38HirPznwC -Camille

urls.description: Find out what the limits are for bringing liquids, aerosols, gels and powders on a flight with Jetstar.

data.text: @Delisyy Hi Delisya, thanks for the tweet. I can see that you were having difficulties paying for your booking. If you could please DM us your booking reference and full name so we could further assist. Regards - Yen
@faddhl Thanks for your tweet Muhammad. We've already responded to your DM. Please check your inbox. Regards – Franz

@nzee0103 Hi there. Yes you will need to pay the applicable fees such as the change fee and the fare difference when changing your ticket. You can also make changes by Manage my Booking here: https://t.co/ZhaX2QqfFZ. Thanks - H

@YuliUntari1 Hi Yuli. This is our contact number in Jakarta: +62 803 852 9779 or 001 803 852 9779 (charges apply, in English, Monday to Sunday, 24 hours, using a non-Indonesian SIM card in Indonesia -you must manually connect to the Indosat mobile network. Thanks - H

data.text: @Bigjohn32819 Hi there. I'm sorry to hear that you're having difficulty in contacting our Telephone Reservations team. If you could provide the details of what have gone wrong with your booking reference along with your full name via DM so we can look into this. Thanks - H

@YuliUntari1 Hi Yuli, thanks for the tweet. You may want to contact our Jakarta office at +613 9645 5999. Please see here: https://t.co/hxkMGwA4BQ for the list of the contact numbers available.  Regards - Joie

urls.title: Contact numbers | Jetstar
urls.description: Hello! The quickest and easiest way to make changes to your booking is at Manage booking. If you can’ t find what you’ re looking for, please give us a call on one of the numbers listed below. 131 538 charges apply, Monday to Sunday 4001 201 260 charges apply, Monday to Sunday in English, Monday to Friday, 9.00am to 6.00pm (local time) in Mandarin and Cantonese +613 9645 5999 charges apply, Monday to Sunday in English, Monday to Friday, 9.00am to 6.00pm (local time) in Mandarin and Cantonese +852 3192

data.text: @orlylow Hi Erwin, we currently do not have any reported issues on our website. You may try clearing your browsing cookies and cache or use a different browser. Please let us know how you go via DM. Thanks, Franz
@imeijatip Hi there, thanks for your tweet. We've already responded to your DM. Regards -  Franz

@PinterPoin Hi Vincent, thanks for the reply and I'm sorry to hear that your preferred mode of payment wasn't successful. We offer a variety of payment options when finalising your booking and I symphathise that this wasn't your experience. Regards - Joie

@PinterPoin Thanks for your tweet Vincent. I recognize that you're having difficulties in paying through bank transfer option. Please DM us with the screenshot of the error you encountered while processing the payment so we can look into this for you. Regards - Franz

data.text: @triyudhaichwan Hi Triyudha, thanks for your tweet and sorry to hear about this. Please DM us your booking reference along with your full name so I can look into this for you. - Franz
@GraemeBolin Hi Graeme, could you provide us more information of this in a DM along with your full name and booking reference, so we can contact both ports to see if they have your item? -Camille
@whnlaws Hi William, thanks for getting back to us. Kindly send us a DM including your booking reference and full name and we'll see how we can assist. Regards - Yen

@whnlaws Hi William, thanks for your reply. She may contact us here via DM. Alternatively, she may also contact us via PM (Private Message) on our Facebook Page here: https://t.co/BY047zdqrG. Just quote 'JQINV585' and she'll be directed to one our agent. Regards - Yen

data.text: @whnlaws Hi William, thanks for the tweet. I recognise that your wife missed their connecting flight. We'd like to look into this, if you could advise your wife to contact us directly and we'll be very glad to assist. Regards - Yen

@quean_bee Hi Beth. I can tell you're disappointed about the service you received from our staff and we'd like to check this for you. Can you provide your booking reference number along with your full name via DM and the details of what have gone wrong. Thanks - H
@R_Kuswandi Hi there. You may want to try paying your booking via credit card. Alternatively, you can here: https://t.co/8VFM8xUTex for other payment options.  Thanks - H

data.text: @ns86btm 2/2 Please see our website’s here: https://t.co/UpWjw6RcEc and https://t.co/PYxagxlU9Z for more information. Regards – Joie

@ns86btm 1/2 Hi, thanks for the tweet. I recognise that you are enquiring the cost for baggage carry-on for Flex Bundle. You may appreciate to know if you have purchased a Flex Bundle you have a 10 kg baggage carry-on allowance. The size of your bag mustn't exceed the size dimensions.

@rarora1515 Hi Rajinder, thanks for the reply. We appreciate the feedback, you may want to pass your feedback to the airport directly as we use whatever facilities available for us at Jakarta airport. Regards - Joie
Jetstar Asia adds 46 services to four cities during Ramadan https://t.co/4OsJJx7FqA https://t.co/CdeOavHgCE

data.text: @alaanndd Hi Bukan, yes, it's possible to do an early check-in. If your flight is departing from Singapore's Changi airport on a Jetstar Asia (3K), Jetstar Airways (JQ), and Jetstar Pacific (BL) flight, you may use this facility up to 12 hours prior the departure. -Camille

data.text: @rarora1515 Thanks for the tweet Rajinder. I recognise that you are disappointed with the number of check-in counters opened at Jakarta airport. I hope you can appreciate that Jetstar are tenants at the airport and use whatever facilities are available for us. I'm sorry for the experience.-J
@SchmidtRAMONE Hello there, I've responded to your DM. Thanks - Lindsay

@SchmidtRAMONE Hi there, thanks for the tweet. I understand that you weren't able to book our discounted fares as you experienced an error with selecting the origin and destination. Kindly DM us with the screenshot of this error so we can look into this further. Thanks - Lindsay

@nyai_yuli Hi there, thanks for your tweet. I'm concerned to hear about the difficulty you're experiencing in making payments into your booking. Can you DM us your booking reference along with your full name so I can check this for your ? Regards - Franz
@SoniaAlczzar Hi Sonia, I've responded to your DM -Camille

@Minkymutt Hi there, thanks for the tweet. Yes, I can confirm that you are able to bring 10 kg for baggage carry-on for Flex Bundle. Please check here: https://t.co/UpWjw6zBME for more details. Regards - Joie

@TomRBlike Hi Tom, thanks for the reply. I can see that you contacted with one of our customer care team. We'd like to look into this further for you. Kindly DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can check this for you. Regards - Joie

@TomRBlike Hi Tom, thanks for the tweet. I understand that you weren't notified about the cancellation of your flight from Melbourne to Singapore. We'd like to further check on this for you. Kindly DM us your booking reference and full name on the booking. Thanks - Lindsay

data.text: @gaemgen Hi there, thanks for your tweet. I understand that you're inquiring about the status of your flight today. Please DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can assist you further. Regards - Franz
@rahul02335093 Hi Rahul, thanks for the tweet. Rest assured that we will notify you regarding any changes with your flight as soon as we got an update, kindly keep your lines open. Regards - Yen

@dercynessa Hi there, thanks for your reply. Rest assured that we will contact you directly via email and SMS to advise regarding any changes with your flight, kindly keep your lines open. Regards - Yen

@dercynessa Hi there, thanks for the tweet. As of this moment, we haven't received any updates regarding flights to and from Clark. Please be assured that we'll notify you as soon as possible. Regards - Yen

@rivoirebaptiste Hi there, thanks for getting in touch. I can appreciate how disappointing it is when your flight with us was delayed. Can you DM us your booking reference along with your full name so I can assist you further ? Regards - Franz

data.text: @lurvemarlo Hi there, thanks for your tweet. I'm concerned to hear about the delay that happened on your flight from Phuket to Singapore. Can you DM us your booking reference along with your full name so I can look into this for you ? Regards - Franz

@gunnarolla Hi there, thanks for the tweet and I'm glad to hear that our crew was able to update you with your flight to Hong Kong. Kindly provide me your full name and booking reference via DM so I can pass on your feedback to the relevant team. Regards - Joie

data.text: @DianEndahS Hi there. I understand that you're trying to pay for your flight online. Please know that we have other payment options available for you. Please see here:https://t.co/8VFM8xUTex. Thanks - H
@biozuilham Hi, I've responded to your DM. -Camille

@RoxanneSaynac Hi Roxanne, thanks for the tweet. I appreciate how frustrating it is when your flight to Bali was cancelled. We'd like to check this further. Kindly DM us your booking reference and full name. Regards - Yen
@panggilakufer Hi Farera, thanks for the tweet. Please know that I've responded to your DM. Regards - Yen

@rlpalmy Hi Richard, thanks for the tweet and for your suggestion. It may help to know that all carry-on luggage, including cabin crew's and safety instructions kit must be placed in overhead bin for safety purposes. We truly appreciate your feedback. Regards - Yen

@panggilakufer Hi there,

Thanks for getting in touch.

Are you able to provide your booking reference along with your full name so I can assist you further ?

Regards, Franz
@ilhamrfqy Thanks for your reply IIham. Please DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can look into this for you. Regards - Franz
@zizieaaron Hi there, could you send us a DM of your full name and booking reference number so we can check the availability? -Camille
@ilhamrfqy Hi Ilham, if you are using DOKU payment - bank transfer, you just need to follow the provided instructions. Could you provide your booking reference number so we can check this? -Camille

data.text: @daysofourcats Hi there. I can appreciate your frustration about booking your flights. You may send us a DM with the flights you'd like to book so we can assist you.  Thanks - H

@daysofourcats Hi there. Sorry to hear if you're having difficulty in accessing our website online. We don't have any system issue reported. I would recommend you to clear cache and delete browser cookies to get the most updated version of our website. You can also use different browsers. - H
@autoanto Hi there, thanks for the tweet. I have replied to your DM. Regards - Joie
@rizkicesaria Hi Rizki, thanks for your tweet. Please DM us your booking reference along with your full name so I can look into this for you. Regards - Franz

@hendri_henk Thanks for your reply Henks. All our 3K flights are manned with two pilots. It may be helpful to know as well that since CASA has lifted this policy, cabin crew do not need to escort the pilot on duty. Regards - Franz
@agildevrian Hi Agil, thanks for getting in touch. Please DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can assist you further Regards - Franz

@hendri_henk Hi Henks, thanks for your tweet. It may help to know that the usual Jetstar flights are being managed by more than 1 Pilot. Rest assured that safety is our number one priority and will not compromise it. Regards - Franz
@katedado Hi K, thanks for your tweet. Please DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can check this further for you. Regards - Franz
@gumaiz Hi Uma, thanks for the tweet. Are you able to DM us your booking reference and full name so I could look into this further? Regards -Yen

@LUTFIAHRAHAYU Hi there. Sorry to hear that you weren't able to contact our Telephone Reservations Team. Kindly send us your booking reference number along with your full name and the details that you wanted for us to update via DM. You can also send us a copy of your valid id for reference.-H

@LittleBatMonkey Hi there, thanks for responding. It may help to know that there are times where the situation is outside of our control and it's inevitable that the flight was delayed. As you may appreciate, we take safety very seriously and we won’t fly unless it’s safe to do so.  Regards - F

data.text: @vitality_AU Hi there. Screwdrivers and other tools are considered a security risk. However, you can take this as part of your checked baggage. You can find more details on the CASA Dangerous Goods App here: https://t.co/AoukzG82xX. Thanks - H

@alyshiaturchyn Thanks for your reply Alyshia Your feedback is essential to us as it’s much harder for us to identify where we need to improve so we genuinely appreciate your comments. Please be assured that we will review this for future improvement with our offerings. Regards – Franz

@alyshiaturchyn Hi Alyshia, thanks for your tweet. It may help to know that safety is our number 1 priority at Jetstar and we take this very seriously. Despite all the efforts we make, sometimes delays are inevitable due to our strict safety standards. Regards – Franz
@FrequentFlyer80 Hi. Thanks for providing us your feedback about your recent flight with us to Hanoi. Please be assured that we will use this for better service improvement. Regards - H
@FrequentFlyer80 Hi there, thanks for your reply. Kindly provide us more information via DM so we could assist. Regards - Yen
@vitality_AU 2/2 However, if you have exceeded your current allowance, you'll incur additional fees. Please see more details here: https://t.co/SCZ6RLtvvV. Regards - Yen

@vitality_AU 1/2 Hi there, thanks for the tweet. I understand that you're enquiring regarding your carry-on allowance. If you have purchased additional 3 kg for your carry-on, your total would be 10 kg.
